results.title: Effect of Chinese herbal medicine for activating blood circulation and detoxifying on expression of inflammatory reaction and tissue damage related factors in experimental carotid artery thrombosis rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ (1.8 mg/kg), XSC (0.135 g/kg) and XSHLC (0.135 g/kg) were administered to @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@, ABC and ABCD group by gastrogavage, and an equal volume of normal saline was given to the sham operation group and the model group.

Effect of Chinese herbal medicine for activating blood circulation and detoxifying on expression of inflammatory reaction and tissue damage related factors in experimental carotid artery thrombosis rats. Chin J Integr Med. 2010 Jun;16(3):247-51. PMID: 20694780
